Chrome.Notes:
1. In the **Console**, use `console.time("label")` to start the timer and stop it with `console.timeEnd("label")` using the same label. 
2. The browser will output the time, in milliseconds, that elapsed since the timer was started.
Chrome.Name: Use labelled timer
